name: container.cpu.time
help: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

name: container.cpu.usage
help: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

name: container.uptime
help: The time since the container started

name: k8s.container.cpu.node.utilization
help: Container cpu utilization as a ratio of the node's capacity

name: k8s.container.cpu_limit_utilization
help: Container cpu utilization as a ratio of the container's limits

name: k8s.container.cpu_request_utilization
help: Container cpu utilization as a ratio of the container's requests

name: k8s.container.memory.node.utilization
help: Container memory utilization as a ratio of the node's capacity

name: k8s.container.memory_limit_utilization
help: Container memory utilization as a ratio of the container's limits

name: k8s.container.memory_request_utilization
help: Container memory utilization as a ratio of the container's requests

name: k8s.node.cpu.time
help: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

name: k8s.node.cpu.usage
help: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

name: k8s.node.uptime
help: The time since the node started

name: k8s.pod.cpu.node.utilization
help: Pod cpu utilization as a ratio of the node's capacity

name: k8s.pod.cpu.time
help: Total cumulative CPU time (sum of all cores) spent by the container/pod/node since its creation

name: k8s.pod.cpu.usage
help: Total CPU usage (sum of all cores per second) averaged over the sample window

name: k8s.pod.cpu_limit_utilization
help: Pod cpu utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container limits. If any container is missing a limit the metric is not emitted.

name: k8s.pod.cpu_request_utilization
help: Pod cpu utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container requests. If any container is missing a request the metric is not emitted.

name: k8s.pod.memory.node.utilization
help: Pod memory utilization as a ratio of the node's capacity

name: k8s.pod.memory_limit_utilization
help: Pod memory utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container limits. If any container is missing a limit the metric is not emitted.

name: k8s.pod.memory_request_utilization
help: Pod memory utilization as a ratio of the pod's total container requests. If any container is missing a request the metric is not emitted.

name: k8s.pod.uptime
help: The time since the pod started

name: k8s.pod.volume.usage
help: The number of used bytes in the pod volume.

name: k8s.volume.available
help: The number of available bytes in the volume.

name: k8s.volume.capacity
help: The total capacity in bytes of the volume.

name: k8s.volume.inodes
help: The total inodes in the filesystem.

name: k8s.volume.inodes.free
help: The free inodes in the filesystem.

name: k8s.volume.inodes.used
help: The inodes used by the filesystem. This may not equal inodes - free because filesystem may share inodes with other filesystems.
